Method Detail

getDescription

java.lang.String getDescription()
Implements required getDescription() method of TokenizationSystem interface.

tokenize

java.util.ArrayList tokenize(java.io.File inputFile, java.lang.String separatorStr)
Implements the required tokenize() method tokenizing a tabulated representation of a text. In the DefaultTokenizationSystem, the tokenizing algorithm is a simple split on white space.
returns:
An ordered list of two-item lists consisting of a string and a class.
Parameters:
inputFile - File with the tabular representation of the text.
separatorStr - String used to separate columns in the tabular file.

tokenizeString

java.util.ArrayList tokenizeString(java.lang.String str)
Tokenizes a String on white space. Uses a GreekNode object from the first thousand years of Greek library to collect text nodes from any XML markup in str, then splits the resulting String on white space.
returns:
An ordered list of Strings.
Parameters:
str - The String to tokenize.
